short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop overpaying for software. Access pricing benchmarks to ensure you pay a fair price every time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Vendr’s Google Chrome Extension, you can:

- Access pricing benchmarks for top software suppliers in one click, anywhere on the web
- View SaaS Buyer Guides with negotiation tactics, insights, and pricing intelligence data  
- Understand the best months to buy
- Compare and view pricing for similar software

Thousands of finance and procurement leaders trust Vendr to help them save time and money buying software. Whether you’re making a new purchase or renewing, ready to buy or browsing, Vendr’s Google Chrome extension is here to help you save.
